page.title: 06SOCIAL CONCERN IN AYLESBURY
page.content: Everyone is entitled to social help but the social workers wait for people to contact them. They help mothers with family centres, and playgroups and childcare{ Mentally ill} people are helped in hospitals like Tindal. Mentally handicapped in Oaklands and Park School and an Adult Training Centre in Bierton.{ Physically handicapped} have Shaftsbury House, a young disabled Unit and the Ludwig Gutman Centre for under 5Â£s. {Youth Action} (young people between 14 and 16) helps with all the activities above and games, discos and parties for all the above people. Aylesbury is a good place to live in without much poverty and low unemployment.
